description: Surrogate unique identifier for a status-change event record. Use as primary key.
Date and time the status change was logged by the system.
Application user who executed the change.
Identifier of the inventory part affected by the change.
Snapshot of the part’s master identifier at the time of the change; likely duplicates the live ID for stable historical reporting; confirm with SME.
Snapshot of the part’s description captured at the time of the change.
Code indicating the resulting lifecycle state after the change. Values are defined by inventory workflow.
Snapshot identifier for the resulting status at the time of the event, preserving historical context.
Snapshot of the human-readable description of the resulting status at event time.
Code for the prior lifecycle state before the change.
Snapshot identifier for the prior status at the time of the event.
Snapshot of the human-readable description of the prior status at event time.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp recorded when a user last edited this record; naming suggests user-related context; confirm with SME.
User account that created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created.
User account that most recently updated this record.
Timestamp when this record was most recently updated.
